channel.title: CVE Feed for Symantec Corporation -- Content Analysis (CA)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Symantec Corporation -- Content Analysis (CA)

item.title: CVE-2016-9092|2024-08-06T02:42:10.913Z -- symantec%20corporation -- content%20analysis%20%28ca%29
item.description: The Symantec Content Analysis (CA) 1.3, 2.x prior to 2.2.1.1, and Mail Threat Defense (MTD) 1.1 management consoles are susceptible to a cross-site request forging (CSRF) vulnerability. A remote attacker can use phishing or other social engineering techniques to access the management console with the privileges of an authenticated administrator user.
